QuestData.Title: Overseer Idra'kess
QuestData.Description: My men are flagging, $n. We won't last much longer against these naga, I'm afraid. With the Idra'kess' weapons, and Nespirah's pearls, we should be ready to bust out of here.$b$bFollow the wall to the southeast, and look for a ramp to the upper chamber. I assume their leader is in there, or perhaps the key to Nespirah's awakening. Hopefully both.$b$bIf you feel strong enough, head up to the top of the shell and look for some answers.
QuestData.LogDescription: Head to the top of Nespirah and slay Overseer Idra'kess.
QuestData.RewardText: No need to bring me up to speed... Nespirah has been narrating your adventures as they happened, and Captain Taylor filled me in on the rest.$b$b<Duarn closes his eyes and nods.>$b$bNespirah says that she is quite grateful, and that she has a small surprise ready for the naga.
